testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to create a new product record via an API connection.
testcase.name: The creation of a new product record via the API should be verified. This can be confirmed by sending a
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/product/97" path parameters........................passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed
